import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import AuthContext from '../Context/AuthContext' import axios from 'axios' import './Header.css' import { Button, FlexboxGrid, Modal, Input } from 'rsuite' import { message } from 'antd' export default function Header() { const { urlServer } = useContext(AuthContext) const [showModal1, setShowModal1] = useState(false) const [showModal2, setShowModal2] = useState(false) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const login = () => { setLoading(true) axios.post(`${urlServer}/login`, {email, password}).then(res => { setLoading(false) if (res.data) { } else { message.error("Email o password sbagliati") } }) } const reset = () => { setEmail('') setPassword('') } return (

Roitinfo

{/* Modal per il login */} {setShowModal1(false); reset()}}> Login setEmail(e)} placeholder="Email" /> setPassword(e)} id="inputPsw" placeholder="Password" />

Non hai un accoutn?

{/* Modal per la registrazione */} {setShowModal2(false); reset()}}> Registrati
) }
